page.title: 07Employment in Maltby
page.content: The major employer is the National Coal Board who employ 1600 workers at Maltby colliery. There is other employment in tool and clothing factories,a brickworks and limestone quarries. There are also jobs in services, such as education,retail trade and personal services. Unemployment has increased greatly over the last decade:-1975 5%,1980 12% and 1985 20%. Thus unemployment is a major problem, especially for school leavers. During the miners strike of 1984/5 a significant proportion of the working population were thus either on strike or unemployed. This had serious consequences for local trade and a number of shops and businesses were forced to close.
